mapper.sql: id AS "id", task_number AS "taskNumber", purchase_id AS "purchaseId", operator AS "operator", operation_time AS "operationTime", task_state AS "taskState", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime",total_quantity AS "totalQuantity",acceptable_quantity AS "acceptableQuantity",received_quantity AS "receivedQuantity",groupd_quantity AS "groupdQuantity"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_warehouse_purchase_storage_task where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and purchase_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purchaseId},'%')
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and operation_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operationTime},'%')
and task_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')

and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')

from wms_warehouse_purchase_storage_task where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')

mapper.update: update wms_warehouse_purchase_storage_task set task_state = #{state} where purchase_id = #{orderId}
update wms_warehouse_purchase_storage_task set task_state = '2' where task_state = '1'
mapper.select: select w.*,p.task_number from wms_purchase_order_info w left join wms_warehouse_purchase_storage_task p on w.id = p.purchase_id where p.task_state = '1' or p.task_state = '2'
